title: Cant log in
body:
So ive been trying to log into League for about 10 minutes now.... Heres what happened .

I usually leave league up on my computer. I left for a few hours and came back. I had left a lobby up but it was ready to que, so I hit start que or whatever is at the bottom. Well, nothing was happening.... so i closed league and tried to bring it up again. Entered in my log in info and its just sat there like it was loading, but wasnt. So i closed it again, and tried it again. Then is said "were experiencing a large number of log ins. your polace in line :1 your wait time: 1 min"

ok.... so I wait.... nothing happening and Im still waiting and its still not logging in. (No its not my internet connection)

replies.body: Everything should be looking better now, thanks for letting us know as soon as it happened!
Same. I think it's an issue on their end, hopefully resolved soon.
